title: Help to all Junglers
body:
I main Yi and Reksai Jungle, if you start gromp of golems please smite as soon as it spawns (you get full bonuses and extra killing speed) 
That is all.

replies.body: Regardless you should be smiting it as soon as they spawn cause by the time you go from gromp/golems - red/blue - wolves/wraiths your smite should be back up ready for second buff. But if you smite them late it will not be back up for another 5-10 seconds depending on the jungler your using and it will most likely cause you to not do it at all cause your getting chunked from the second buff or potential loss on buff cause you are to low to contest against an invade.
